A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Every one of these new Star Wars films has quite the legacy to live up too. Not only must the film continue the tale that began so perfectly with the original trilogy\, it has to appease old fans and bring in the new ones without having anyone feel alienated. It's a mean feat to try and pull off and Force Awakens certainly got the ball rolling. This movie is that ball rolling at lightning speed with a passion that lives in every single frame of the 150-minute runtime. Every frame is filled with a kind of energy that drags you in and takes you along for the films incredible ride.
